column2: Used to emphasize the truth or reality of a situation (на самом деле действительно)
Used to express emphasis or confirmation (действительно правда)
Used to express uncertainty or possibility (может быть возможно)
Used to show uncertainty or suggest something politely (возможно может быть)
Used to show something is obvious or easy to understand (ясно очевидно)
Used to emphasize certainty (определённо точно)
Used to emphasize the basic or most important part of something (по сути в основном)
To grasp the meaning or significance of something (понимать)
To make something clear or easy to understand (объяснять)
To talk about something in detail (обсуждать)
To improve the quality or value of something (улучшать усиливать)
To improve something by making small changes (усовершенствовать улучшать)
A specific goal or aim (цель задача)
A strong desire to achieve something (стремление желание)
A job or role in a company or organization (должность позиция)
The state of having a paid job (работа занятость)
To control or direct something such as a project or people (управлять руководить)
To deal with a situation or problem (справляться иметь дело)
A plan of action to achieve a goal (стратегия план)
A clear understanding of something complex (понимание озарение)
A chance for progress or advancement (возможность шанс)
An increase or development in size or success (рост развитие)
Working well without wasting time or resources (эффективный)
Something that can be used for support or help (ресурс источник)
Putting time effort or money into something for future benefit (инвестиция вложение)
A group of connected people or systems (сеть круг общения)
Information or opinions about something for improvement (обратная связь)
Definition and Translation
A successful result brought about by effort (достижение)
To distribute resources or duties for a specific purpose (распределять)
Something that provides stability or confidence (якорь опора)
A detailed examination of something (анализ)
To express ideas clearly and effectively (чётко формулировать)
To aim or hope to achieve something (стремиться)
Official inspections of accounts or systems (аудиты проверки)
Independence or self-governance (автономия)
A standard for comparison or evaluation (эталон ориентир)
Something that causes change or action (катализатор)
To pledge or dedicate oneself to something (обязаться посвятить себя)
Definite and specific not abstract (конкретный)
Deep thought or reflection (размышление)
Standards by which something is judged (критерии)
A measurable aspect or feature (измерение аспект)
A person's usual attitude or mood (характер настроение)
To become or make something smaller or less (уменьшать)
To obtain something from a source (получать происходить от)
Participation or involvement (вовлечённость)
To improve or increase (улучшать усиливать)
A state of human flourishing or fulfillment (эйдаймония состояние благополучия)
To judge or assess the value of something (оценивать)
To grow or develop successfully (процветать)
The process of putting something into effect (внедрение реализация)
A new idea method or product (инновация)
The ability to understand without reasoning (интуиция)
The act of putting in resources for future benefit (инвестиция)
A reason or desire to act or achieve (мотивация)
To find the way through a situation or place (навигация ориентироваться)
Surgery on the nervous system especially the brain (нейрохирургия)
A general description or plan showing the essential features (набросок план)
Comprehensive or all-embracing (всеобъемлющий)
A particular point of view (точка зрения)
A period or state of little or no growth (застой плато)
A collection of work or investments (портфель)
Something that is regarded as more important than others (приоритет)
A suggested plan or idea (предложение)
The reason for which something is done (цель назначение)
To distribute again in a different way (перераспределять)
The ability to recover from difficulties (устойчивость жизнестойкость)
A feeling of contentment or fulfillment (удовлетворение)
The ability to control one's own behavior and emotions (самоорганизация)
Finding something good without looking for it (счастливая случайность)
Important or meaningful (значительный)
Relating to social and economic factors (социально-экономический)
A person with an interest in something (заинтересованное лицо)
People or groups with an interest or concern (заинтересованные стороны)
A plan of action to achieve a goal (стратегия)
A company controlled by another company (дочерняя компания)
To maintain or keep going (поддерживать)
The path or direction something follows over time (траектория)
A change from one state or condition to another (переход)
To develop or reveal gradually (разворачиваться)
An idea or mental image of the future (видение представление)
